name: Screencap'd
description:
Made in 72 hours for Ludum Dare 31 by Ava Skoog and Marte Kvamme Strømmen. The theme was entire game on one screen. Keyboard or gamepad.  🎮

http://ludumdare.com/compo/ludum-dare-31/?action=preview&uid=6155

Oh, no! Captured in a screen! Find your way out of this prison by completing the levels in this puzzle platformer where you can turn the level in all directions.
